info.title: Fractal Agents Runtime — TypeScript
info.description: Free, self-hostable LangGraph-compatible agent runtime. TypeScript/Bun implementation — v0.1.0 with auth, persistence, store API, multi-provider LLM, and SSE streaming.

tags.name: Assistants
tags.description: An assistant is a configured instance of a graph.

tags.name: Threads
tags.description: A thread contains the accumulated outputs of a group of runs.

tags.name: Thread Runs
tags.description: A run is an invocation of a graph / assistant on a thread. It updates the state of the thread.

tags.name: Stateless Runs
tags.description: A run is an invocation of a graph / assistant, with no state or memory persistence.

tags.name: Store
tags.description: Cross-thread key-value storage for long-term memory. Items are scoped by namespace, key, and authenticated user.

tags.name: System
tags.description: System endpoints for health checks, metrics, and server information.

post.description: Create a new assistant with the specified configuration.
Search for assistants matching the specified criteria.
Count assistants matching the specified criteria.

get.description: Retrieve an assistant by its ID.

delete.description: Delete an assistant by its ID.

post.description: Create a new thread for running conversations.
Search for threads matching the specified criteria.
Count threads matching the specified criteria.

get.description: Retrieve a thread by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a thread by its ID.

get.description: Get the current state of a thread.
Get the state history of a thread.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of history entries to return.

get.description: List all runs for a thread.

post.description: Create a new run on a thread (background execution).
Create a run and stream results via Server-Sent Events.
Create a run and wait for completion, returning final output.

get.description: Get a specific run by ID.
Wait for a run to complete and return the result.
Stream events from an existing run via SSE.

post.description: Execute a stateless run and stream results via SSE.
Execute a stateless run and wait for completion.

put.description: Store or update (upsert) an item by namespace and key. If an item with the same namespace and key already exists for the authenticated user, its value and updated_at are overwritten.

get.description: Retrieve a store item by namespace and key (provided as query parameters).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the item within the namespace.

delete.description: Delete a store item by namespace and key (provided as query parameters).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the item within the namespace.

post.description: Search items within a namespace, optionally filtering by key prefix. Results are sorted by key and paginated.

get.description: List all namespace strings that contain at least one item for the authenticated user.
Check if the service is healthy.
Get detailed service information including capabilities and configuration status.
Get the OpenAPI 3.1 specification document for this runtime.

detail.description: Error message describing what went wrong.

recursion_limit.title: Recursion Limit
recursion_limit.description: Maximum recursion depth for the graph.
